General_Description: '''Shadow Forces''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Greece]] is being taken over by forces working from the shadows. They are less apparent, but might be more dangerous than our enemy. Destroy their forces."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed numerous [[Followers of Ares]], [[Daughters of Artemis]], and [[bandit]]s all over Greece, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
